    MarketingWhy SMS Loyalty Programs Work for Restaurants (And Outperform Custom Apps)Ryan Roberts•May 22, 2025Why SMS Loyalty Programs Work for Restaurants (And Outperform Custom Apps)If you run a restaurant, you already know this: repeat customers are your lifeblood. They spend more, come back more often, and are more likely to bring their friends. That’s why loyalty programs aren’t just a nice-to-have—they’re a growth tool. But not all loyalty programs are created equal.Custom apps? Punch cards? Most of them fail to gain traction.Enter SMS loyalty programs. They’re simple, effective, and way more powerful than most restaurant owners realize.Why Loyalty Programs Work for RestaurantsLoyalty programs are proven to:Increase visit frequency by rewarding return customers.Boost average order value by offering tiered incentives.Give you customer data to personalize promotions.Build emotional loyalty with exclusive deals and VIP status.In short, they help you turn casual diners into regulars.Why Most Loyalty Programs Fall FlatThe concept of rewarding loyalty is solid. The execution, however, is often where things go wrong.Custom apps are expensive to build, require constant updates, and rely on customers downloading, logging in, and engaging regularly. That’s a big ask.Punch cards are easy to fake, easy to lose, and impossible to track.Unless you’re Starbucks or Chick-fil-A, most customers won’t download your app—and even fewer will keep using it.Why SMS Loyalty Programs Are a Game-ChangerWith SMS, customers simply text a keyword to join your program. From there, they receive automated messages with offers, reminders, and rewards.Here’s why SMS outperforms apps:No app to download Everyone knows how to text. No logins. No tech learning curve.98% open rates Most SMS messages are read within 3 minutes. You’re not competing with email clutter or muted push notifications.Instant enrollment and redemption Join by texting a keyword. Redeem by clicking a link or showing a code. No lost cards or forgotten logins.Automated engagement Send “You’re one visit away from a free item!” or “Come back this week for double points!” without lifting a finger.Lower cost, better results No app dev budget needed. Just a cost-effective channel that performs.How to Launch a Loyalty Program with SMS (Today)It’s easier than you think:Send a one-time opt-in text, provide QR codes that create pre-populated text keywords for opt-ins and make the QR code visibleOffer a reward for joining (like 20% off or a free drink).Use automated follow-ups to bring people back.Within 24 hours, you can have a fully functioning, high-converting loyalty program running on autopilot. To simplify this process and put your sms marketing on auto-pilot check out Boostly.Final ThoughtYou don’t need an app. You need results.SMS loyalty programs are the modern way to build customer relationships that last. They’re simple for your staff, easy for your customers, and powerful for your bottom line.Ready to See Boostly in Action?See how you can get more orders, reviews and customer loyalty without lifting a finger.Get Free Demo© 2025 Boostly.
